original: HANSSON, Sven Axel, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Frankfurt/M, Tyskl, 18/11 07 av ing A S H o Madelene Stern, gm Ella Carlson. Studex Västerås 26, ex KTH (E) 30. Anst v ASEA 30—31, Telefon AB L M Ericsson 32— 42 (ch f rekiamavd 35—42), ch.red f Teknisk Tidskrift sed. 43, konsult i reklam- o försäljn.-frågor h AB Aerotransport. Lär i annonskomposition v spec.kurser i Sthlms Stads Hdlssk sed. 40, rådgiv i Tekn Nomenklaturcentralen sed. 42. Led av Feras propagandaråd sed. 35, skattmäst i Sthlms Reklamfrn 37 —41, styr.led i Sv Annonsörers Frn 37—42, i Sv Reklamfrb 39—42, sekr i Riksfrb Sv Filmamatörer sed. 36, led av Internat Amatörfilm-frbs arb.utsk sed. 39, sekr i Tjm:s Soc.dem Frn sed. 43, styr.led i Sv Kryssarklubben (red f »På Kryss») sed. 43, ordf i Fotograf Frns filmsekt sed. 43. Resor: Flert europ länder, Turkiet, Nordafr. Av trycket: Upps i reklam-, försäljn-, fotografi- o amatörfrågor. Diplom i glidflygn, silvermärke i kanotpadd-ling. Hobbies: Foto o filmning, skidåkning, segling, segelflygning, grammofonskivor (jazz) samt konst. °HANSSON, Thure Elof Birger, Direktör, Uppsala, f Tierp 16/10 96. Studex Upps 17. Tjm i Mälarebkn 19—26, i Sv Hdlsbkn 26—27, kamrer i Liljefors Sportaff Upps 27—31, vkst dir där sed. 32. Kass i Uppl Gymn.frb, Upps Studenters Idr.frn, Gymn.frn o Motionsgymn.-avd, v. sekr i Oskarsfrb. ’HANSSON, Anders Valerius, Direktör, Göteborg, f Gbg 25/12 89. Vkst dir i Valerius Hansson AB. Ordf i Frn Gbgs Herrekipe-ringar, styr.led i Sv Köpmfrb, Sv Beklädn-& Manuf.haridl.frn o dess arb.utsk.
translated:
HANSSON, Sven Axel, Civil Engineer, Stockholm, born in Frankfurt/M, Germany, on 18/11/1907, son of A.S.H and Madelene Stern, married to Ella Carlson. Studied in Västerås until 1926, graduated from KTH (E) in 1930. Employed at ASEA from 1930 to 1931, Telefon AB L M Ericsson from 1932 to 1942 (head of the advertising department from 1935 to 1942), editor-in-chief of Teknisk Tidskrift since 1943, consultant in advertising and sales at AB Aerotransport. Teacher in advertisement design at special courses at Sthlms Stads Hdlssk since 1940, advisory role in Tekn Nomenklaturcentralen since 1942. Member of Feras propagandaråd since 1935, treasurer of Sthlms Reklamfrn from 1937 to 1941, board member of Sv Annonsörers Frn from 1937 to 1942, board member of Sv Reklamfrb from 1939 to 1942, secretary of Riksfrb Sv Filmamatörer since 1936, member of Internat Amatörfilm-frbs arb.utsk since 1939, secretary of Tjm's Soc.dem Frn since 1943, board member of Sv Kryssarklubben (editor of "På Kryss") since 1943, chairman of Fotograf Frns filmsekt since 1943. Has traveled extensively in several European countries, Turkey, and North Africa. Published works on advertising, sales, photography, and amateur matters. Holds a diploma in gliding and a silver award in canoeing. Hobbies include photography and filming, skiing, sailing, gliding, listening to jazz records, and art.

HANSSON, Thure Elof Birger, Director, Uppsala, born in Tierp on 16/10/1896. Studied in Uppsala until 1917. Worked at Mälarebkn from 1919 to 1926, at Sv Hdlsbkn from 1926 to 1927, treasurer at Liljefors Sportaff Upps from 1927 to 1931, and has been the managing director since 1932. Treasurer of Uppl Gymn.frb, Upps Studenters Idr.frn, Gymn.frn, and Motionsgymn.-avd, vice secretary of Oskarsfrb.

HANSSON, Anders Valerius, Director, Gothenburg, born in Gothenburg on 25/12/1889. Vice chairman of Valerius Hansson AB. Chairman of Frn Gbgs Herrekipe-ringar, board member of Sv Köpmfrb, Sv Beklädn-& Manuf.haridl.frn, and its work committee.
